items.title: Facilities, IT & Service Requests
items.details: All staff submit requests via Microsoft Forms. Weekly Word reports to Practice Manager, Ankur Yadav, and Dr. Yadav. Supervisors are copied on auto-acknowledgments.
items.note: Keep credentials out of public pages. Route sensitive data via MS 365.

items.title: Printing Locations
items.details: Canton: 3rd floor MA station printer AFPMG105P; 2nd floor check-in desk AFPMG11P. Jasper: coordinate with Trina, Laura, or Leslie for access.

items.title: Responding to Patient Reviews
items.details: Use PatientPoint to aggregate. Reply publicly to Google reviews only; acknowledge PatientPoint feedback internally. Keep responses cordial, concise, personalized by name.

items.title: Extinguisher & Alarm Inspections
items.details: Canton: Alliance Fire (Inspections + Alarm). Jasper: Cliff’s Fire Extinguishers. Maintain separate schedules per vendor.

items.title: Room/Space Reservations (Canton Lower Level)
items.details: Use Calendly to reserve lower level space.
